purpose: Enhance 3D modeling workflows in Blender using AI-driven tools and agents.
principle: Leverages AI models and agents to automate and assist in 3D content creation within Blender.
reusability: Designed as a plugin for Blender, allowing easy integration into existing 3D modeling projects.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited functionality and stability issues; primarily supports Blender.
name: meshgen
description: Use AI Agents directly in Blender.
highlight: Integrates AI Agents directly into Blender for enhanced 3D modeling capabilities.
